title: What is India's future in politics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Politics is something which can never cease to exist. I am assuming you are asking about the future of India’s youth. Talking about that, I am optimistic about the movements that are lead by youth through out the world and at the same time I have apprehensions when it comes to the issue of depoliticized youth. There is a kind of passiveness thats creeping in where everybody is retreating to their cocoons. Politics is seen as a dirty game where many of us do not want to indulge ourselves. The early we realize that politics is indispensable the better it is.
